testcase.name: test_case_api_00001_场景测试用例01
testcase.system-out: replace_list: [] replace_list: [] select name, extract from cases_testextract where case_id='28' [('sign', 'headers.Sign'), ('host', 'headers.Host')] extracts: ('sign', 'headers.Sign') resp_json: {'args': {}, 'data': '{}', 'files': {}, 'form': {}, 'headers': {'Accept': '*/*', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Content-Length': '2', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Host': 'httpbin.org', 'Sign': 'abc123', 'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'X-Amzn-Trace-Id': 'Root=1-62e54e8d-0c1dd191785760ce62b895bd'}, 'json': {}, 'origin': '14.221.173.225', 'url': 'http://httpbin.org/post'} update cases_testextract set value='abc123' where case_id='28' and name='sign' update cases_testextract set value='httpbin.org' where case_id='28' and name='host'

testcase.name: test_case_api_00002_场景测试用例02
testcase.system-out: replace_list: ['${host}'] name: host select value from cases_testextract where name='host' ('httpbin.org',) new: http://httpbin.org/post replace_list: ['${sign}'] name: sign select value from cases_testextract where name='sign' ('abc123',) new: abc123 replace_list: [] replace_list: [] select name, extract from cases_testextract where case_id='29' [('tom', 'json.name')] extracts: ('tom', 'json.name') resp_json: {'args': {}, 'data': '{"name": "tom", "age": "18"}', 'files': {}, 'form': {}, 'headers': {'Accept': '*/*', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Content-Length': '28', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Host': 'httpbin.org', 'Sign': 'abc123', 'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'X-Amzn-Trace-Id': 'Root=1-62e54e8e-23063aa51a932aee2a063b59'}, 'json': {'age': '18', 'name': 'tom'}, 'origin': '116.4.118.86', 'url': 'http://httpbin.org/post'} update cases_testextract set value='tom' where case_id='29' and name='tom'

testcase.name: test_case_api_00003_场景测试用例03
testcase.system-out: replace_list: ['${host}'] name: host select value from cases_testextract where name='host' ('httpbin.org',) new: http://httpbin.org/post replace_list: ['${sign}'] name: sign select value from cases_testextract where name='sign' ('abc123',) new: abc123 replace_list: ['${tom}'] name: tom select value from cases_testextract where name='tom' ('tom',) new: tom replace_list: [] select name, extract from cases_testextract where case_id='30' [('number', 'json.number')] extracts: ('number', 'json.number') resp_json: {'args': {}, 'data': '{"tom": "tom", "number": "10000"}', 'files': {}, 'form': {}, 'headers': {'Accept': '*/*', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Content-Length': '33', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Host': 'httpbin.org', 'Sign': 'abc123', 'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'X-Amzn-Trace-Id': 'Root=1-62e54e90-0968368a6b1cb6ee19e59719'}, 'json': {'number': '10000', 'tom': 'tom'}, 'origin': '183.23.73.4', 'url': 'http://httpbin.org/post'} update cases_testextract set value='10000' where case_id='30' and name='number'
